entries.femaleVariant: I miss anything?
I still can't believe Alex decided the best place for a bar was right over our old safehouse.
Been dark for seven years, this place. Let's brighten things up again.
Not really.
Don't mind it.
Nah, always feels like I got a stick up my ass.
'Course, who doesn't?
Ouch, sucks to be you. 'Fraid it ain't up for debate.
Then you'll like what I whipped up.
Now Myers is a whole 'nother story, but Songbird? No, I got nothing against her.
[Open]
This your iron?
Sure is. "Her Majesty's" been itchin' to return to active duty.
I'd be honored.
I believe we are. I'll hang back a while and then meet you there.
Take your time. Grab anything you think might be useful.
Let's ride down.
Where we headed?
On a little trip down memory lane. To see some old junk.
She always had a twisted sense of humor.
Where's she at? Waitin' downstairs?
That it? We set?
Place stinks of memories, huh?
Like, not like – why's it matter?
What's it matter? Gotta do what needs doin', preferences be damned.
All right, lil' miss sourpuss.
A surprise awaits you in the box.
Fancy or not – couldn't care less.
Makes no difference either way.
Good, ‘cause you will doll up, honey.
What just happened?
It's fine, 'm all right.
Sit down… How can I help?
V? What's wrong?!
Political change.
To win an invisible war in Dogtown.
Wanted to test the waters, see which way the currents were flowin'.
Hansen's dominance over Dogtown doe'n't benefit Hands nohow, so he's out to level the playing field.
Got an invisible war goin' on in Dogtown. Hansen against anyone who wants a slice of the pie.
Hands sees an opportunity. Wants my help in exploiting it.
Dogtown's locked in a neverending power struggle. Lotta biz to go around, but only Hansen reaps the rewards.
Hands is gunnin' to… diversify who controls what, when and where. My skills and know-how're to… facilitate that.
Hands has the mind of a corpo. War's like a biz to him, runs it that way.
He pits everyone against each other. By the time they realize they're all fightin' on his behalf, it'll be too late.
Politics. It's the same shit wherever you go…
Come on…
It's killin' me.
Long story…
Gets worse every day. Time I have left's evaporatin' quick.
Long story, but yeah. It's pullin' a hostile takeover of my brain.
Do you experience them often, these attacks?
Don't really keep count, but… never know if the next one won't be my last.
Wow, rough.
No shit. Death's breathin' down my neck, always.
That reminds me. Hands – what'd he want in return for the favor he did us?
Some reminiscing…
A little o' this, a little o' that. We'll plan in a sec. Say, V – like playin' fancy dress-up?
V, you're gonna enter through a flooded tunnel system. Got a top-o'-the-line divin' suit, oughta fit you snug as a glove.
Water's maybe a little super toxic...? So, yeah, be careful.
A little dusty, but well-preserved.
What're we gonna do with it once I'm on the Riviera?
Gonna lock yourself in here, fondle all this old, dead tech till your balls shrivel up?
Burn it to the ground's what we'll do.
And never come back.
Now that I like.
Really... Startin' to get used to it.
This the Relic?
What else?
Nah, just a lil' dust allergy…
Uh-huh, fucking Relic.
I know what that feels like.
Bein' a dead man walkin'?
What're you talkin' about?
Doubt you do, actually.
Bein' a dead man walkin'?
What do you mean?
Truly? How would you know?
Exactly.
Ambush, attempt on my life seven years back…
I was betrayed. By our people, the FIA.
All for a ceasefire. Peace comes at a price... Someone's always gotta pay it.
C'mon, wanna show you something.
She's finishing up recon in town.  We should make ourselves at home till she gets back.
Let's go.
She tried to shoot you?
Probably had no choice.
"Pulled the trigger" as in literally took out her iron and shot you?
Probably had no choice.
Not personally. But she unlocked the door for those who came and did.
Did, didn't… it's irrelevant now. What happened, happened.
I was leavin' the city, headin' home. Songbird was still here, in this very room, in fact.
Neutralizing me – her last assignment in Night City. Then she got her ticket home.
Yet you're now tryin' to save her.
And yet you're now tryin' to save her... Why?
entries.maleVariant: And you're now tryin' to save her... Why?

entries.femaleVariant: Because it's the right thing to do.
Y'know, if not for you, we'd have no way of gettin' into the Black Sapphire, reachin' Songbird.
'Kay, let's talk gear.
I say "betrayed" but I was sold out. Part of a deal, a "peace offering." My head on a silver platter.
The end of any war's never pretty. Both sides race to tie up loose ends...
Every night we waited for Arasaka agents to come finish us off. I had to make a choice.
I chose to dig our heels in.
I thought we still had a fighting chance.
Either way, we managed to save a few more agents. The price for that was yours truly.
You play grown-up games, you face grown-up consequences.
Tragic story.
Sounds like you brought it on yourself.
Say what you want, but they betrayed you.
Tragic story, that…
Honestly? Sounds like you brought it on yourself.
Say what you want, but sounds like they stabbed you in the back, plain 'n' simple.
Funny. Out of everyone, it was Songbird they asked to pull the trigger.
Well, I wrote it myself.
Brutal but sincere. I can respect that.
Saving many of my people in the process.
Out to save her now, or lookin' for revenge?
Reed... What you're doin' now... this savin' her or is it revenge?
I don't have a vengeful bone left in me.
A car bomb blew up one of my crew, another was poisoned, a third got shot in the back of the head buyin' a pack o' smokes. A couple of others just vanished without a trace.
I never talked about this, y'know…
Care to explain?
Tell me more?
I landed in the ICU, where I waited for some Arasaka goon to come finish me off.
Wait…
Yeah...
She was guiding me on comms. Led me straight into a trap.
What about Reed?
Toxic how?
You'll reach a terminal at the end, jack in and breach the cams, giving Reed his window to slip into the building.
What about Reed?
Toxic how, exactly?
From suspect waste, some sewage leak, too... Don't worry, suit's piss-'n'-shit-proof.
Was just about to mention... He'll be there too, of course.
You'll take different elevators up, here.
Area could be heavily guarded, so you'll have to be on your tippy-toes. Couldn't get clean intel, so you'll just have to be creative, improvise.
Soon as you meet up, you'll doll up like it's prom night and go to the ball. That's where you'll rendezvous with Songbird.
All clear?
OK, how we gettin' in again?
Clear.
How do we get inside again?
You're swimmin' in through flooded tunnels. Reed'll take the high road after you let him inside.
How do I let Reed in?
Remind me – how do I get Reed in?
You'll swim to the other side, find the terminal, jack in, breach the cams, locate Reed and crack a door.
Then you'll take elevators up, Reed'll open a path to his side. You'll then sneak past the guards and stroll into the party like NC royalty.
Seared all that into your brain?
Sound good?
Yup…
Preem.
It's good to have you on our side. I mean that, V.
Fuck, Reed…
I had plenty of time to examine this under a microscope. Under focus, some things sharpen, others blur.
But there comes a point when you just cut through the bullshit and see what's in front of you.
Songbird is still my people, and nothing can change that.
I should be sayin' they tried to kill me, but… sometimes it feels like they actually succeeded.
Sayin' I'm talkin' to a ghost?
So I'm talkin' to a ghost?
[Stand] They kill you, and you're still workin' for them?
Hang on… They set you up, yet here you are, workin' for 'em again?
entries.maleVariant: Hang on… They set you up, yet here you are workin' for 'em again?

entries.femaleVariant: [Stand] I get it. You feel responsible for her.
I get it. You feel responsible for her. You're captain, she's crew.
Even deep wounds stop hurting eventually, scar over… A few years on, they're just an itch.
No matter what sinking ship she's on, I'll be there to get her off. Even if I have to go down with it.
It was bold, it was stupid – a mix of both? Maybe I just didn't know how to walk away, let it rest.
Or maybe... I don't know how to lose.
I dove into old mission files, wherever So Mi was involved. They were buried deep, near impossible to access, even with my clearance.
Each 'n' every one… the Blackwall. All authorizations, mission orders, personally signed by one person – Rosalind Myers.
The NUS is a small country governed by a woman with highly ambitious goals. Sometimes those ambitions win out over reason.
Managed to learn that some pop megastar is gonna grace the party with a show. Guest list? Expect everybody who’s anybody.
That includes you. Gonna don fancy outfits and rub shoulders with VIPs. Be warned, though – fancy doesn’t mean easy…
Ready for the detes, V?
Lemme have 'em.
Gonna tell me anyway.
Lemme hear 'em.
No, but you're gonna dump 'em on me anyway.
What’s with you? Ready or not?
Black Sapphire. The most heavily guarded place in Dogtown. Doesn’t mean security’s airtight, though.
Now focus.
Sol'll open a passage to his side. ‘Fore you ask – yeah, it’s the only way.
You’re gonna meet... here.
Already know what the hotel looks like. Really, really hard to miss.
Flooded tunnels, here. That’s your way inside.
So, good, let's get this show goin'. I checked up on Slider's contention. He fuckin' had it right, it turns out.
Wouldn't wanna be in her shoes if that shit floats to the top.
But that's not somethin' we need to pore over now. Alex, what do you have for us?
Myers?
So why Myers?
[Wait]
Yeah, you said. What exactly happened there, Reed?
